body: idk, I feel like I'd still enjoy it

OK SO pages 211-214 is an epilogue to Ore ga Osananajimi no Koibito ni Naru nante Zettai Arienai/There's absolutely no way I'll become my childhood friend's ♀ lover!
That dude ruined his friend's life with the wish overwriting the guy. The epilogue is cute and all but knowing the story, it's against mc's original will.
I dunno why, but the final few pages (marriage + pregnancy) just killed me. Why the fuck does it hurt so much to read porn?
